statements: DELETE FROM PaymentGatewaySecurityChecks WHERE transaction_id = 101 AND amount > 100.00;
DELETE FROM PaymentGatewaySecurityChecks WHERE card_number = '1234567890123456' AND transaction_date < '2021-11-30';
DELETE FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 500 AND action = 'login';
DELETE FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 500 AND access_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM payment_transactions WHERE user_id = 101 AND amount > 1000.00;
DELETE FROM flagged_attempts WHERE transaction_id = 205 OR user_id = 101;
DELETE FROM flagged_attempts WHERE reason = 'Fraudulent attempt';
DELETE FROM payment_attempts WHERE status = 'failed' AND transaction_id = 100;
DELETE FROM security_logs WHERE log_id IN (SELECT log_id FROM security_logs WHERE event_type = 'Unauthorized Access');
